sources.title: Wise Girls (1929)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. This comedy follows a plumber aspiring to be an architect who is convinced into becoming engaged to a rich girl so she can attract the jealousy of another man. Wise Girls' story might sound a little convoluted, but for an early sound film it has a longer runtime to pad out and make sense of the plot.Â

metadata.Plot: The father of three grown daughters tries to keep his sanity, even after his free-spirited middle daughter rebelliously marries a poor plumber.
metadata.Writer: J.C. Nugent, Elliott Nugent, Margaret Booth
metadata.Actors: Elliott Nugent, Norma Lee, Roland Young
